forgotPassword.title: Cwangcisa kwakhona igama lokugqitha
forgotPassword.successMessage: I-imeyile yokuseta kwakhona igama lokugqitha ithunyelwe ngempumelelo kwidilesi enikiweyo. Nceda ujonge ibhokisi yakho engenayo kunye nefolda yogaxekile. Uza kuthunyelwa kwakhona kungekudala.
forgotPassword.prompt: Faka idilesi ye-imeyile ehambelana neakhawunti yakho, kwaye siza kukuthumelela ikhonkco lokuseta kwakhona igama lakho lokugqitha.

validation.min: Igama lokugqitha kufuneka libe nobuncinane oonobumba abasi-8

login.emailPasswordRequired: Idilesi ye-imeyile kunye negama lokugqitha ziyafuneka.
login.invalidCredentials: Idilesi ye-imeyile okanye igama lokugqitha alilunganga.
login.unexpectedError: Kukho impazamo engalindelekanga eyenzekileyo ngexesha lokungena.
login.googleFail: Ayiphumelelanga ukungena ngeGoogle. Nceda uzame kwakhona.
login.googleAccountExists: Iakhawunti sele ikhona ngale dilesi ye-imeyile kusetyenziswa indlela eyahlukileyo yokungena.
login.googleUnexpectedError: Kukho impazamo engalindelekanga eyenzekileyo ngexesha lokungena ngeGoogle.
login.googleProfileSaveError: Ukungena kuphumelele, kodwa ayikwazanga ukugcina iinkcukacha zeprofayile.

register.weakPassword: Igama lokugqitha libuthathaka kakhulu. Kufuneka libe nobuncinane oonobumba abasi-8.
register.unexpectedError: Kukho impazamo engalindelekanga eyenzekileyo ngexesha lobhaliso. Nceda uzame kwakhona.

forgotPassword.userNotFound: Akukho akhawunti ifunyenweyo ngale dilesi ye-imeyile.
forgotPassword.unexpectedError: Kukho impazamo engalindelekanga eyenzekileyo. Nceda uzame kwakhona.

toast.passwordResetSent: I-imeyile yokuseta kwakhona igama lokugqitha ithunyelwe. Nceda ujonge ibhokisi yakho engenayo (kunye nefolda yogaxekile).
